name: Schema Adherence

task.description: Test model's ability to generate SQL that adheres to provided schema
task.initial_prompt: Generate a SQL query based on the schema and question.
task.context:
Schema:
users (id, name, email)
orders (id, user_id, amount, date)

test_cases.input: Find all users who have placed orders over $100

optimization_challenge: Models may hallucinate columns or use incorrect table names. Optimizer must emphasize schema constraints.
